original: @55b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @55b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ka kha sya do ha n'a ma /
analyzed: ka kha sya do ha n'a ma /
translated: Kakhasya-dohana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: ka kha'i do ha zhes bya ba /
analyzed: ka kha'i do ha zhes bya ba /
translated: The DohƒÅ of Kakhasya

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Glorious Heruka.

original: da ni yum gyi padma'i nang du gnas pa 'di yin te //
analyzed: da ni yum gyi padma'i nang du gnas pa 'di yin te //
translated: Now, this is the one dwelling within the lotus of the mother:

original: lus ni rnam par bcings shing bdud rtsi 'dzag / mgul nas 'khyud pa'i dom bi gzhon nu ma //
analyzed: lus ni rnam par bcings shing bdud rtsi 'dzag / mgul nas 'khyud pa'i dom bi gzhon nu ma //
translated: The body is bound, nectar drips, the young girl Dombi embraces the throat.

original: ga bur 'dzag cing 'di ni dpyid ka'i yal ga yin //
analyzed: ga bur 'dzag cing 'di ni dpyid ka'i yal ga yin //
translated: She drips camphor, this is the branch of spring.

original: kha ni nam mkha' gnas par dpral ba'i stong pa ste //
analyzed: kha ni nam mkha' gnas par dpral ba'i stong pa ste //
translated: The mouth abides in space, the forehead is empty.

original: dge dang mi dges ma gos gcer bul //
analyzed: dge dang mi dges ma gos gcer bul //
translated: Unclothed, untainted by virtue or non-virtue.

original: za zhing 'thung yang mya ngan 'das la gnas //
analyzed: za zhing 'thung yang mya ngan 'das la gnas //
translated: Though eating and drinking, one abides in nirvana.

original: rnal 'byor gcer bu bzung nas shin du dga' //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gcer bu bzung nas shin du dga' //
translated: Having taken up the naked yogic discipline, one is extremely joyful.

original: nam mkha' dag ni khyab cing brtan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dag ni khyab cing brtan par gyur pa'o //
translated: Space is pervaded and becomes stable.

original: ga ni nam mkha' 'jo zhing 'jo zhing 'thung bar byed //
analyzed: ga ni nam mkha' 'jo zhing 'jo zhing 'thung bar byed //
translated: Ga is space, sucking and sucking one should drink.

original: gang g'a ya mu na ni gnyis ni legs par chings //
analyzed: gang g'a ya mu na ni gnyis ni legs par chings //
translated: The two, Ganga and Yamuna, are well-bound.

original: srid la brten te 'gro 'ong 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: srid la brten te 'gro 'ong 'chad par 'gyur //
translated: Based on existence, coming and going are explained.

original: gha ni dril bu'i sgra yis dpal ldan he ru ka ni mnyes //
analyzed: gha ni dril bu'i sgra yis dpal ldan he ru ka ni mnyes //
translated: Ga is the sound of the bell, which delights the glorious Heruka.

original: bdag med ma yis mgul nas yang dang yang du 'khyud //
analyzed: bdag med ma yis mgul nas yang dang yang du 'khyud //
translated: Again and again, he is embraced around the neck by NairƒÅtmya.

original: rnal 'byor ma yis rlung rnams yang nas yang du 'pho //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yis rlung rnams yang nas yang du 'pho //
translated: The yoginƒ´s again and again transfer the vƒÅyus.

original: khyim bdag mo ni gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang la 'pho //
analyzed: khyim bdag mo ni gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang la 'pho //
translated: The householder transfers into the state of the innate mind.

original: nga ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
analyzed: nga ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
translated: I am the innate nature, empty by nature.

original: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo la dge dang mi dge mi 'phro zhing //
analyzed: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo la dge dang mi dge mi 'phro zhing //
translated: In the innate householder, virtue and nonvirtue do not proliferate.

original: rgyun du rnal 'byor pa ni bde bar byed nus na //
analyzed: rgyun du rnal 'byor pa ni bde bar byed nus na //
translated: If the constant yogin is able to generate bliss,

original: nub mo'i mun pa chad nas 'od gsal stong par 'gyur //
analyzed: nub mo'i mun pa chad nas 'od gsal stong par 'gyur //
translated: the darkness of the night is severed and luminosity arises.

original: tsa ni dga' ba bzhi ni 'di dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: tsa ni dga' ba bzhi ni 'di dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Ca is endowed with the four joys.üîΩKye ho! Grasp the mind free from the four extremes!

original: kye ho mtha' bzhi dang ni bral ba'i sems bzung cig / skad cig bzhi ni yang dag bla ma'i gsung las go bar gyis //
analyzed: kye ho mtha' bzhi dang ni bral ba'i sems bzung cig / skad cig bzhi ni yang dag bla ma'i gsung las go bar gyis //
translated: Understand the four moments from the guru‚Äôs instruction.

original: thig le bzhi ni rmongs @56a * //
analyzed: thig le bzhi ni rmongs @56a * //
translated: The four bindus are deluded.

original: pa'i bag chags kyis ni mi shes so //
analyzed: pa'i bag chags kyis ni mi shes so //
translated: The latent tendencies of ignorance do not know it.

original: tsha ni dbang po spongs la dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: tsha ni dbang po spongs la dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The syllable tsa is the abandonment of the sense faculties,

original: 'dod yon dang ni dngos dang dngos med spongs //
analyzed: 'dod yon dang ni dngos dang dngos med spongs //
translated: the abandonment of sense objects and things and nonthings,

original: cal col gtam rnams dor cig 'di rnams kyis //
analyzed: cal col gtam rnams dor cig 'di rnams kyis //
translated: and the abandonment of frivolous speech.

original: ro 'di thong la nam mkha' la ni longs spyod kyis //
analyzed: ro 'di thong la nam mkha' la ni longs spyod kyis //
translated: Abandon this taste and enjoy the sky!

original: dza ni skye dang rga dang 'chi ba med pa'i nam mkha' yin //
analyzed: dza ni skye dang rga dang 'chi ba med pa'i nam mkha' yin //
translated: The syllable ja is the sky of nonbirth, aging, and death.

original: gang dang gang du bltas kyang de dang de ru nam mkha'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang du bltas kyang de dang de ru nam mkha'o //
translated: Wherever one looks, it is the sky.

original: ji ltar gnas ba de ltar de ni de nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar gnas ba de ltar de ni de nyid do //
translated: Just as it is, it is thatness.

original: ji ltar mthong ba de ltar de ni don dam mo //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba de ltar de ni don dam mo //
translated: Just as it is seen, it is the ultimate.üîΩThe syllable jha is like the cultivation of the seed of many flowers,

original: dzha ni me tog mang po'i sa bon ji ltar bsten pa dang // de ltar sna tshogs kyis ni phung po 'grub pa yin ;
analyzed: dzha ni me tog mang po'i sa bon ji ltar bsten pa dang // de ltar sna tshogs kyis ni phung po 'grub pa yin ;
translated: and the various aggregates are accomplished.

original: / sna yis sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gnyis 'thung nus na //
analyzed: / sna yis sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gnyis 'thung nus na //
translated: If the nose is able to drink both honey and butter,

original: yun rings dus dag 'tsho ba la ni the tshom med //
analyzed: yun rings dus dag 'tsho ba la ni the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that one will live for a long time.

original: skabs 'dir nya yig gis drangs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig med pa 'di 'grel par yang nya ni nga dang mtshungs so zhes pa tsam las ma byung ngo //
analyzed: skabs 'dir nya yig gis drangs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig med pa 'di 'grel par yang nya ni nga dang mtshungs so zhes pa tsam las ma byung ngo //
translated: In this case, the commentary on the verse drawn from the letter nya is only this: ‚ÄúNya is like me.‚Äù

original: ta ni kye ho yang dag bla ma'i gsung gi thig le phab //
analyzed: ta ni kye ho yang dag bla ma'i gsung gi thig le phab //
translated: Ta is the falling of the bindu of the speech of the true guru.üîΩThe earth moves, and the bindu falls from the sky.

original: sa gzhi 'gul bas nam mkha' las ni thig le 'dzag / lam log cal col ma byed kye ho rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: sa gzhi 'gul bas nam mkha' las ni thig le 'dzag / lam log cal col ma byed kye ho rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Do not make a false, meaningless sound, O yogi!

original: khyod kyis cal col gyis ni lhan skyes mi rtogs so //
analyzed: khyod kyis cal col gyis ni lhan skyes mi rtogs so //
translated: You will not realize the innate by meaningless sound.üîΩThe sound of tha tha is the utterance of mantras.

original: tha tha'i sgras ni sngags rnams brjod pa dang // tha yi yi ge blangs nas gnas thob 'gyur //
analyzed: tha tha'i sgras ni sngags rnams brjod pa dang // tha yi yi ge blangs nas gnas thob 'gyur //
translated: Having taken the letter tha, one attains the state.

original: tshul bzhin long na ting nge 'dzin ni 'pho par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshul bzhin long na ting nge 'dzin ni 'pho par 'gyur //
translated: If one is not successful, one will attain samƒÅdhi.

original: yang dag bla mas nam mkha' go bas byang chub yin //
analyzed: yang dag bla mas nam mkha' go bas byang chub yin //
translated: Awakening is the sky that is understood by the true guru.

original: da ni sngags rnams brjod cing dom bi long //
analyzed: da ni sngags rnams brjod cing dom bi long //
translated: Now, one should utter the mantras and play the ·∏çombi.

original: gtum mos bsregs shing chu rnams 'dzag par 'gyur //
analyzed: gtum mos bsregs shing chu rnams 'dzag par 'gyur //
translated: The fire burns, and the waters fall.

original: da ma ru ni aa na ha yi skad du grags //
analyzed: da ma ru ni aa na ha yi skad du grags //
translated: Da ma ru is known in the language of India as a·πáaha.

original: da ma ru de bzung bas rnal 'byor ma sgra yin //
analyzed: da ma ru de bzung bas rnal 'byor ma sgra yin //
translated: Now, by holding that drum, the yoginƒ´ is sound.

original: dha ni ril ba pho bas rnam pa gcig tu khyab par gyur //
analyzed: dha ni ril ba pho bas rnam pa gcig tu khyab par gyur //
translated: The syllable dha is the skull, which is pervaded by a single entity.

original: sems ni 'pho bas lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sems ni 'pho bas lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: The mind is transferred, becoming the supreme connate [joy].

original: dbang po lnga yang 'pho zhing lhan skyes der zhugs so //
analyzed: dbang po lnga yang 'pho zhing lhan skyes der zhugs so //
translated: The five sense organs are also transferred, entering into that connate [joy].

original: gab pa'i khyim bdag mo ni dngos po cir mi mthong //
analyzed: gab pa'i khyim bdag mo ni dngos po cir mi mthong //
translated: The hidden householder lady is not seen as any thing.

original: na ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
analyzed: na ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis ni stong //
translated: The syllable na is the intrinsic nature, empty by nature.

original: gnyug ma'i yid ni go na dge dang mi dge mi 'gos shing //
analyzed: gnyug ma'i yid ni go na dge dang mi dge mi 'gos shing //
translated: When the intrinsic mind is understood, virtue and nonvirtue are not accrued.

original: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo ni lhan cig skyes pas bangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo ni lhan cig skyes pas bangs par 'gyur //
translated: The hidden householder lady is served by the connate [joy].

original: rgyun du bsten na skye shi dang ni 'ching bar 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: rgyun du bsten na skye shi dang ni 'ching bar 'gyur ba med //
translated: If one relies on it continuously, there is no birth, death, or bondage.

original: ta ni sku gsum gzhung gsum brtan nas shes par gyis //
analyzed: ta ni sku gsum gzhung gsum brtan nas shes par gyis //
translated: The syllable ta is the three kƒÅyas and the three texts; know that.

original: yi ge gsum ni sa ra ha yi tshig la brten te bsgoms //
analyzed: yi ge gsum ni sa ra ha yi tshig la brten te bsgoms //
translated: The three syllables are meditated on in dependence on the words of Saraha.

original: @56b sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyis //
analyzed: @56b sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyis //
translated: The mind is the meditative concentration of equanimity.

original: de nyid blta zhing bshad pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de nyid blta zhing bshad pas ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the use of looking at reality and explaining it?

original: tha ni nam mkha'i zla ba can ni brtan par gyis //
analyzed: tha ni nam mkha'i zla ba can ni brtan par gyis //
translated: Tha is the one who has the sky-moon, make firm.

original: gnas rnams bor na legs pa'i lus su ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas rnams bor na legs pa'i lus su ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: If the places are abandoned, how will there be a good body?

original: gnas su brtan par byas na rlung gis skems par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas su brtan par byas na rlung gis skems par 'gyur //
translated: If the places are made firm, the wind will dry up.

original: brtan por gnas par gyur na tshe 'di 'phel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: brtan por gnas par gyur na tshe 'di 'phel bar 'gyur //
translated: If one abides firmly, this life will increase.

original: da ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis thams cad bsregs dang 'chi med 'gyur //
analyzed: da ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis thams cad bsregs dang 'chi med 'gyur //
translated: Now, by the words of Saraha, all will be burned and immortal.üîΩWith the two milks, bathe that supreme one.

original: 'o ma gnyis kyis bde mchog de la khrus kyis shig / thig le gnyis ni shes na dag pa'i rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: 'o ma gnyis kyis bde mchog de la khrus kyis shig / thig le gnyis ni shes na dag pa'i rang bzhin yin //
translated: If the two bindus are known, they are of the nature of purity.

original: sdug bsngal gdug pa can ni dngos dang dngos med med //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gdug pa can ni dngos dang dngos med med //
translated: The suffering of the poisonous one is neither entity nor nonentity.

original: dha ni dha yi rang bzhin bkru bshal byed cing gnas //
analyzed: dha ni dha yi rang bzhin bkru bshal byed cing gnas //
translated: Dha is the nature of dha, bathing and washing.

original: bkru bshal byed kyang mi mthong nang du zhugs nas song //
analyzed: bkru bshal byed kyang mi mthong nang du zhugs nas song //
translated: Even though one bathes and washes, not seeing, enter within and go.

original: khrus mkhan mo ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis long //
analyzed: khrus mkhan mo ni sa ra ha yi tshig gis long //
translated: The washerwoman is satisfied with the words of Saraha.

original: g-yo sgyu'i sbyor ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin du ni gyis //
analyzed: g-yo sgyu'i sbyor ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin du ni gyis //
translated: Make the practice of deceit the nature of the sky.

original: na ni sna tshogs tshul gyis legs par gcig tu 'pho //
analyzed: na ni sna tshogs tshul gyis legs par gcig tu 'pho //
translated: Na is the excellent transference by various means.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams ma go bas na sna tshogs smra //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams ma go bas na sna tshogs smra //
translated: The worldly ones, not understanding, speak in various ways.

original: gang phyir 'jigs pa med pa de phyir sho gam 'jal //
analyzed: gang phyir 'jigs pa med pa de phyir sho gam 'jal //
translated: Because there is no fear, therefore one pays no duties.

original: srid min mya ngan 'das min gzhan yang med pa yin //
analyzed: srid min mya ngan 'das min gzhan yang med pa yin //
translated: It is neither existence nor nirvana, nor is there anything else.

original: pa ni bdud rtsi lnga ni sna ru blugs par bya //
analyzed: pa ni bdud rtsi lnga ni sna ru blugs par bya //
translated: The five nectars are to be poured into the nostrils.

original: padma rdo rje sbyar zhing sbyar zhing mnyam nyid 'grub //
analyzed: padma rdo rje sbyar zhing sbyar zhing mnyam nyid 'grub //
translated: The lotus is joined with the vajra, and by joining, equality is accomplished.

original: me tog padma'i rdo rje gdan ni mchod par gyis //
analyzed: me tog padma'i rdo rje gdan ni mchod par gyis //
translated: Worship the seat of the vajra lotus flower.

original: padma'i de nyid mi shes bde chen rgyal po min //
analyzed: padma'i de nyid mi shes bde chen rgyal po min //
translated: Not knowing the reality of the lotus, one is not the king of great bliss.

original: pha ni spro zhing bsdu ba'i sems 'di nam mkha' lta bu yin //
analyzed: pha ni spro zhing bsdu ba'i sems 'di nam mkha' lta bu yin //
translated: The father is this expansive and contracting mind, like space.

original: spro ba mi mthong yang ni nam mkha' lta bur 'dod //
analyzed: spro ba mi mthong yang ni nam mkha' lta bur 'dod //
translated: Expansion is not seen, but it is asserted to be like space.

original: phat kyi sgra dang h'um gi sgra ni ji ltar 'phro //
analyzed: phat kyi sgra dang h'um gi sgra ni ji ltar 'phro //
translated: How does the sound of Phat and the sound of Hum expand?

original: 'di ltar dpag bsam ljon shing sdong po bzhin du 'phro //
analyzed: 'di ltar dpag bsam ljon shing sdong po bzhin du 'phro //
translated: In this way, it expands like the trunk of a wish-fulfilling tree.

original: ba ni nags kyi tshangs pa'i me tog kha zum bye pa'i rdzing rnams 'dzin //
analyzed: ba ni nags kyi tshangs pa'i me tog kha zum bye pa'i rdzing rnams 'dzin //
translated: The father holds the closed and blooming flowers of the forest and the ponds.

original: theg cing yid 'ong 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dpyid ka'i yal ga bzhin //
analyzed: theg cing yid 'ong 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dpyid ka'i yal ga bzhin //
translated: The vehicle is pleasing, the fruit of desire is like a spring branch.

original: dbang du bsdu zhing legs par gar ni nan tan byed //
analyzed: dbang du bsdu zhing legs par gar ni nan tan byed //
translated: One should be intent on gathering power and dancing well.

original: 'gro 'dug byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni rang gi lus la bslangs //
analyzed: 'gro 'dug byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni rang gi lus la bslangs //
translated: The yoginƒ´ of going and sitting is raised up in one‚Äôs own body.

original: bha ni bha ga nyid ni bha ga'i rang bzhin stong par gnas //
analyzed: bha ni bha ga nyid ni bha ga'i rang bzhin stong par gnas //
translated: The syllable bha is the bhaga, the nature of the bhaga, abiding in emptiness.

original: de ni dge dang mi dge med par mda' bsnun nga yis smras //
analyzed: de ni dge dang mi dge med par mda' bsnun nga yis smras //
translated: I, KƒÅ·πáha, say that it is neither virtuous nor nonvirtuous.

original: bla ma'i gsung gis 'dod yon lnga la zo //
analyzed: bla ma'i gsung gis 'dod yon lnga la zo //
translated: Eat the five sense objects by the guru‚Äôs word.

original: 'khrul bar ma byed sems nyid 'di ni nam mkha' yin //üîΩma ni nan tan gyis ni yang dang yang du chang 'dzag cing //
analyzed: 'khrul bar ma byed sems nyid 'di ni nam mkha' yin // ma ni nan tan gyis ni yang dang yang du chang 'dzag cing //
translated: Do not be deluded! This mind itself is space.

original: dpal @57a * //
analyzed: dpal @57a * //
translated: The syllable ma is the vagina, which drips again and again with effort.

original: ldan bla ma bsten pas rtsa ba go bar gyis //
analyzed: ldan bla ma bsten pas rtsa ba go bar gyis //
translated: Understand the root by relying on the glorious guru.

original: gal te rtsa ba'i sems dang blo gnyis gcig tu byed nus na //
analyzed: gal te rtsa ba'i sems dang blo gnyis gcig tu byed nus na //
translated: If one is able to make the root mind and the mind one,

original: sems ni shi zhing chad par gyur bas rang bzhin gcig yin no //
analyzed: sems ni shi zhing chad par gyur bas rang bzhin gcig yin no //
translated: the mind is dead and cut off, so they are of the same nature.

original: ya ni gang tshe n'a da dang ni thig le 'dir smras na //
analyzed: ya ni gang tshe n'a da dang ni thig le 'dir smras na //
translated: The syllable ya is when the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ and the bindu are said to be here.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi sgra yis de tsha lhan cig skyes par rtogs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi sgra yis de tsha lhan cig skyes par rtogs //
translated: The sound of the Yoginis is known as the Innate.

original: ji ltar rang dgar gnas pa de bzhin du ni brten //
analyzed: ji ltar rang dgar gnas pa de bzhin du ni brten //
translated: One should rely on it just as one likes.

original: skye shi gnyis kyis 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: skye shi gnyis kyis 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the state of fearlessness from birth and death.

original: ra ni nyi ma zla ba'i thig le nam mkha' bzhin du shi ba med //
analyzed: ra ni nyi ma zla ba'i thig le nam mkha' bzhin du shi ba med //
translated: Ra is the drop of the sun and moon, like the sky, without death.

original: nyi mas gang na bde ba chen po'i tshul ni shin du mdzes //
analyzed: nyi mas gang na bde ba chen po'i tshul ni shin du mdzes //
translated: The way of great bliss is very beautiful wherever the sun is.

original: ra sa n'a ni thig le thig le phob //
analyzed: ra sa n'a ni thig le thig le phob //
translated: Ra sanan is the drop, the drop that falls.

original: nyin dang mtshan du gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang du sod //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du gnyug ma'i yid kyi ngang du sod //
translated: Day and night, be extinguished in the state of the innate mind.

original: la ni kye ho rlung gi khyim bdag mo de khyim nang long //
analyzed: la ni kye ho rlung gi khyim bdag mo de khyim nang long //
translated: La is the mistress of the house of the wind, O Kye! Enter her house!

original: n'a da thig le long cig chos ni zag med nyid yin no //
analyzed: n'a da thig le long cig chos ni zag med nyid yin no //
translated: Na da is the drop, the drop that falls. The Dharma is immaculate.

original: la la n'a dang bcas dang ra sa aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsa nang nas //
analyzed: la la n'a dang bcas dang ra sa aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsa nang nas //
translated: La la na and ra sa are in the channel of the avadhuti.

original: thig le 'dzag pa de nyid shin tu ngo mtshar phyir ni 'thung //
analyzed: thig le 'dzag pa de nyid shin tu ngo mtshar phyir ni 'thung //
translated: Drink the falling drop, which is very wondrous.

original: wa ni chu yi mchog ni rol pas 'thung cig kye //
analyzed: wa ni chu yi mchog ni rol pas 'thung cig kye //
translated: Va is the supreme water, which is drunk with play.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni rol pas 'phro //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni rol pas 'phro //
translated: The Vajrayoginis play and scatter.

original: gang tshe dpal mo rnal 'byor ma ni lhan cig skyes pas mnyes //
analyzed: gang tshe dpal mo rnal 'byor ma ni lhan cig skyes pas mnyes //
translated: When the glorious Yoginƒ´ is pleased by the innate,

original: de yi tshe na da ma ru ni aa na ha yi skad du grags //
